amendment.description: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit the use of funds to pay the salary and expenses of DHS Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
